segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender uniquely identifies the Justified payment request message by means of its number and type (for example, investment payment, functional payment etc.).

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general dates (accounting year, registration date, etc.) and, when relevant, times related to the whole message. The segment must be specified at least once to identify the date the payment request was issued.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying total monetary amounts for the payment request (for example, total amount remaining to be deducted from future payments).

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment providing general processing information in respect to the whole payment request, such as the budgetary nature of the request, e.g., investment, operational, etc.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying free text information eventually providing a description of the payment justification.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A segment group to provide reference information about the payment request such as the contract against which the payment is to be made (budget references, reference documents) and where necessary, their dates.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying reference information about the payment, such as the contract concerned or budgeting information, by their number and where appropriate, the version number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the referenced information.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the parties relevant to the payment request with associated information such as responsible service or visa date.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of parties, in coded or clear form, and their relevant function for the payment request. Identification of the sender of the request and the payment service are mandatory for the Justified payment request message. Other parties may also be identified as required.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment specifying specific contact information such as the service involved related to the referenced information.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying key dates relative to the payment such as visa date of the service in question.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments providing information about the payment requested as well as the documents which are required to justify it. This includes information such as amounts, dates, results formula calculations, article information, tax information, party information and other references.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying the documents associated with the payment request such as the payment request documents and their associated justifications.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment providing general processing information, such as economic indicators or credit categories.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying reference information about the payment, such as budgeting information, by their number and where appropriate, the version number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying date/time/period details such as the date the request was posted in the accounts or the date of emission of a justification document.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment providing information about the amounts which the document in question justifies. This includes amounts such as credit requests and adjustment amounts.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying free text information eventually providing a description of the document in question.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the parties involved in the justification and eventually amounts due and bank account information.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the party, such as the beneficiary, factoring party, justification originator or co- contractor.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying information such as the beneficiary's bank account.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts, such as the amount payable to the party if the distributed sum is being split between different beneficiaries.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying the parties involved in the Justification, the amounts due to them, their bank account information along with any eventual related parties and associated banking information.

segment.name: Anti-collision segment group header
segment.documentation: UGH, A segment to head, identify and specify an anti- collision segment group in order to permit the identification of beneficiaryï¿½s, and any eventual related parties such as factors.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments identifying any eventual related party, such as a factor, along with his bank information and the exact relationship between the two parties.

segment.name: Relationship
segment.documentation: REL, A segment identifying the exact relationship between the two parties.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the related party, such as a factor.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying information such as the bank account of the related party.

segment.name: Anti-collision segment group trailer
segment.documentation: UGT, A segment to end and check the completeness of an anti-collision segment group.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments identifying complementary documents which may be associated with a justification and eventually other references and any parties associated with it.

segment.name: Document/message summary
segment.documentation: DMS, A segment identifying a document associated with a justification by its type and identification, such as related messages from other transmissions.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying other reference information related to the document being described.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying parties related to the document being described, such as its sender.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying tax and eventually monetary information associated with the document being detailed.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying the tax information, such as the rate of value added tax (VAT) associated with the document being detailed.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts, such as the amount of VAT, in relation with the tax in question.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments identifying justification information about calculation results using specific formulae, such as a price revision formula, a penalty formula, or a bonus formula.

segment.name: Formula
segment.documentation: FOR, A segment identifying the formula used for the calculation.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment identifying general processing information about the formula, such as whether it is a provisional or definitive calculation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying date and eventually time information, such as the number of days or months late.

segment.name: Rate details
segment.documentation: RTE, A segment identifying the value of the coefficient calculated by the formula.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying information such as the amounts calculated, amounts exonerated or the amount on which penalties can be calculated.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying information such as the rate of VAT applicable to the value resulting from the calculation.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments identifying index information and eventually their dates of application and any specific coefficients which were used in the calculation.

segment.name: Index details
segment.documentation: IND, A segment identifying the indexes and eventually the index values which were used in the formula calculation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying date and eventually time information, such as the date of reading of the indexes.

segment.name: Rate details
segment.documentation: RTE, A segment identifying any coefficient details in relation with the index, such as the linking coefficient between index evolutions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: SG13-SG14-SG15 A group of segments identifying detailed payment request information or information about articles along with the information which is related to them.

segment.name: Line item
segment.documentation: LIN, A segment identifying an item and eventually the line number on which the item is to be found in the document. Items can relate to information such as the payment breakdown, specific articles, etc.

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, A segment identifying an item by an additional identification number such as a manufacturer's article number.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the numbers related to the item in question, such as the number of articles delivered or the quantity invoiced.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying date and eventually time information, such as the effective delivery date, associated with the item in question.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying tax information, such as the applicable rate of tax, associated with the item in question.

segment.name: Rate details
segment.documentation: RTE, A segment identifying any rate details, such as the rate of increase or discount, associated with the article in question.

segment.name: Document/message summary
segment.documentation: DMS, A segment identifying documents related to the item in question, such as the specific justification documents associated with a payment request.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying any references associated with the item in question, such as the official reference of the beneficiary.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment identifying general processing information about the item in question such as the nature of the beneficiary.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A segment group specifying monetary amounts and eventually their associated currencies and payment instructions.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying monetary amounts such as the amount to be paid, the amount for the item with or without VAT, etc.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment specifying the currency and eventually the exchange rate associated with the monetary amount.

segment.name: Payment instructions
segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying any eventual payment instructions for the amounts in question, such as the payment means.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments identifying parties and eventually their bank account information in relation to the item in question.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the party associated with the item in question, such as the beneficiary, or the manufacturer of the item.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying information such as the party's bank account.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments identifying information about calculations using specific formulae associated with the item in question, such as penalties or bonuses.

segment.name: Formula
segment.documentation: FOR, A segment identifying the formula used in a calculation, such as a bonus or penalty calculation.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment identifying general processing information about the formula, such as whether it is a provisional or definitive calculation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying date and eventually time information, such as the number of days or months late, in respect to the formula calculation.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying information such as the amounts calculated, amounts exonerated or the amount on which penalties can be calculated.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments identifying monetary information associated with the item in question and eventually a breakdown of the monetary information such as a budget breakdown.

segment.name: Monetary amount function
segment.documentation: ARD, A segment identifying the relationship between monetary amounts, such as principal, interests or adjustment amounts.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts, such as the amount of the principal.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying date and eventually time information, such as the number of days or months late in payment.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying tax information such as the rate of VAT applied.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments identifying information such as a detailed budget breakdown.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying sequence breakdown of the monetary amount identified previously.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment general processing indicators related to the monetary amount breakdown, such as various budgetary indications.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates and eventually times related to the monetary amount breakdown, such as the budgetary year.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying monetary amounts such as the budgeted amount.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references, such as the different budget references.
